mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(NOTICECODE, SUBJECT, CONTENT, USERSCODE, ISNOTICE, ORIGINALFILENAME, SAVEFILENAME) VALUES (notice_seq.NEXTVAL, #{subject}, #{content}, #{usersCode}, #{isNotice}, #{originalFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saveFilename , jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT S.USERSCODE, N.NOTICECODE, SUBJECT, CONTENT, TO_CHAR(CREATED, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CREATED, S.NAME, ISNOTICE, S.ORIGINALFILENAME, S.SAVEFILENAME FROM STAFF S JOIN NOTICE N ON S.USERSCODE=N.USERSCODE WHERE NOTICECODE = #{num}

SELECT tb.* FROM ( SELECT NOTICECODE, SUBJECT FROM NOTICE
AND (NOTICECODE > #{num})
ORDER BY NOTICECODE ASC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM=1

SELECT tb.* FROM ( SELECT NOTICECODE, SUBJECT FROM NOTICE
AND (NOTICECODE < #{num})
ORDER BY NOTICECODE DESC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM=1
